ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics

Class CommentListModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.AModel<AView>
      • ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.CommentListModel

  • public class CommentListModel
extends AModel<AView>
    CommentListModel holds the sorting data and the functions to add a comment within the list. This list can then be cleared as needed and comments can be updated.
